short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keepr: Store your receipts, warranties, policies and assets online

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
KEEPR is an online records storage and notification platform.

Our mission is to help consumers, home owners and small business owners organise their records better. We achieve this by storing all your important records such as;

* Receipts
* Warranties
* Contracts
* Insurance Policies
* Assets

KEEPR keeps your data organised and securely online so that you have information at your fingertips to review on demand or export for insurance claims or tax time.


KEEPR reminds you of the approaching review date of your records via email so you can be ready to:

* Replace broken or problematic appliances
* Review and renew insurance policies at better rates
* Be on top of your licenses and passport renewals


KEEPR provides you with reports on your records, so you can know:

* Asset values, by supplier or date range
* Record review dates in ascending order

Don't miss a deadline! 

Keep your data safe with Keepr, the insurance policy for your records.
